settings.left_content: Assembly instructions for Solo Pod / Phone Booth

settings.left_content: Assembly instructions for Folio Phone Booth
settings.custom_html:
<!-- 
  /de-at	YmsY5y
/de-de	Xwzazg
/es-es	Xc49bG
/fr-be	UedqMm
/fr-fr	T9rQeT
/nl-be	VySLmZ
/nl-nl	R78bGe
/no-no	XrVUdS
/sv-se	WbTNYC
/	VQrxxM
 -->
<script>
  $(document).ready(function(){
   $('#page-all-grid-0-btn').on('click', function(e){
      if (window.location.href.indexOf("/sv-se") > -1) {
              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
              window._klOnsite.push(['openForm', 'WbTNYC']);
      } else if (window.location.href.indexOf("/de-de") > -1) {
              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
              window._klOnsite.push(['openForm', 'Xwzazg']);
      } else if (window.location.href.indexOf("/no-no") > -1) {
              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
              window._klOnsite.push(['openForm', 'XrVUdS']);
      } else if (window.location.href.indexOf("/fr-fr") > -1) {
              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
              window._klOnsite.push(['openForm', 'T9rQeT']);
      } else if (window.location.href.indexOf("/nl-nl") > -1) {
              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
              window._klOnsite.push(['openForm', 'R78bGe']);
      } else if (window.location.href.indexOf("/nl-be") > -1) {
              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
              window._klOnsite.push(['openForm', 'VySLmZ']);
      } else if (window.location.href.indexOf("/fr-be") > -1) {
              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
              window._klOnsite.push(['openForm', 'UedqMm']);
      } else if (window.location.href.indexOf("/de-at") > -1) {
              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
              window._klOnsite.push(['openForm', 'YmsY5y']);
      } else if (window.location.href.indexOf("/es-es") > -1) {
              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
              window._klOnsite.push(['openForm', 'Xc49bG']);
      }else{
              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
              window._klOnsite.push(['openForm', 'VQrxxM']);
      }
    });
  })
</script>

settings.left_content: Download assembly instructions for Meeting Pod 3 - 4 Person
settings.custom_html:
<!-- large -->
<script>
  $(document).ready(function () {
    const data = [
      {
        form_id: "UVWuaG",
        locale:'/nl-nl',
        name: "Slots-L-GetSpecs-Netherlands",
      },
      {
        locale:'/de-at',
        form_id: "QNGUSv",
        name: "Slots-L-GetSpecs-Austria",
      },
      {
        locale:'/es-es',
        form_id: "VDAM8H",

        name: "Slots-L-GetSpecs-Spain",
      },
      { locale:'/fr-be',
        form_id: "WTCSmX",

        name: "Slots-L-GetSpecs-Belgium (Fr)",
      },
      {
        locale:'/fr-fr',
        form_id: "RwmdQw",

        name: "Slots-L-GetSpecs-France",
      },
      { locale:'/nl-be',
        form_id: "Y9EXBd",
        name: "Slots-L-GetSpecs-Belgium (NL)",
      },
      { locale:'/sv-se',
        form_id: "TpqmGp",

        name: "Slots-L-GetSpecs-Sweden",
      },
      { locale:'/no-no',
        form_id: "RFBJxi",

        name: "Slots-L-GetSpecs-Norway",
      },
      { locale:'default',
        form_id: "RiusWR",

        name: "Slots-L-GetSpecs-UK",
      },
      {
        locale:'/de-de',
        form_id: "V9dYZZ",
        name: "Slots-L-GetSpecs-Germany",
      },
    ];
    $("#page-all-grid-3-btn").on("click", function (e) {
        const defaultForm = { locale:'default',
        form_id: "RiusWR",

        name: "Slots-L-GetSpecs-UK",
      }
        const form =data.find(item=>window.location.href.indexOf(item.locale)> -1)||defaultForm
        window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
        window._klOnsite.push(["openForm", form.form_id]);
    });
  });
</script>

settings.left_content: Download assembly instructions for Meeting Booth 4 - 6 Person
settings.custom_html:
<!-- xl -->

<script>
        $(document).ready(function () {
          const data = [
    {
        locale:"/de-de",
        "name": "Slots-XL-GetSpecs-Germany",
        "form_id": "UECX2m"
    },
    {
        locale:"default",
        "name": "Slots-XL-GetSpecs-UK",
        "form_id": "TYZEcR"
    },
    {
        locale:"/no-no",
        "name": "Slots-XL-GetSpecs-Norway",
        "form_id": "RPsv7V"
    },
    {   locale:"/sv-se",
        "name": "Slots-XL-GetSpecs-Sweden",
        "form_id": "Rh4GQG"
    },
    {   locale:"/nl-be",
        "name": "Slots-XL-GetSpecs-Belgium (NL)",
        "form_id": "Ta7QGz"
    },
    {   locale:"/fr-fr",
        "name": "Slots-XL-GetSpecs-France",
        "form_id": "Uq9VVP"
    },
    {   locale:"/fr-be",
        "name": "Slots-XL-GetSpecs-Belgium (Fr)",
        "form_id": "TWppZY"
    },
    {
        locale:"/es-es",
        "name": "Slots-XL-GetSpecs-Spain",
        "form_id": "TpZBJK"
    },
    {   locale:"/de-at",
        "name": "Slots-XL-GetSpecs-Austria",
        "form_id": "U7DUGL"
    },
    {
        locale:"/nl-nl",
        "name": "Slots-XL-GetSpecs-Netherlands",
        "form_id": "XpZEuF"
    }
];
          $("#page-all-grid-4-btn").on("click", function (e) {
              const defaultForm =  {
                        "name": "Slots-XL-GetSpecs-UK",
                        "form_id": "TYZEcR"
                }
              const form =data.find(item=>window.location.href.indexOf(item.locale)> -1)||defaultForm
              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
              window._klOnsite.push(["openForm", form.form_id]);
          });
        });
      </script>

settings.title: Step inside a booth
settings.description: We'd love for you to see a Sound box store. Visit our UK or Spanish showroom or schedule a virtual tour to see the booths for yourself.

settings.content: In today's fast-paced and bustling work environment, it's no secret that busy environments can be chaotic, interruptive and frustrating.
